hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw.geometricobjects

Class GeometricObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw.geometricobjects.GeometricObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line

    public abstract class GeometricObject
extends Object
    Represents abstract geometric object. Implements methods for registration and deregistration of listeners, as well as static methods for getting instances of geometric objects from their string representation.
    Author:
    ilijan

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Getter for the object name.
        Returns:
        name of the object.

      • getProperties

        public List<Property> getProperties()
        Getter for the object properties.
        Returns:
        properties of the object.

      • populateProperties

        protected abstract void populateProperties()
        Populates list of properties which are modifiable through graphical user interface.

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)
        Setter for the name.
        Parameters:
        name - new name of the object.

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(Graphics2D g)
        Draws geometric object using provided Graphics2D graphics object.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D object used for rendering graphics.

      • addDrawingObjectListener

        public void addDrawingObjectListener(DrawingObjectListener l)
        Adds DrawingObjectListener to the collection of listeners.
        Parameters:
        l - listener to be added.

      • removeDrawingObjectListener

        public void removeDrawingObjectListener(DrawingObjectListener l)
        Removes DrawingObjectListener from the collection of listeners.
        Parameters:
        l - listener to be removed.

      • fire

        public void fire(GeometricObject source)
        Notifies all DrawingObjectListener objects that are subscribed to the object that the object is changed.
        Parameters:
        source - object whose change triggers notification to all listeners.

      • setSecondPoint

        public abstract void setSecondPoint(Point point)
        Sets second point when drawing geometric object using two mouse clicks. Object is created using two specified points.
        Parameters:
        point - second point needed for construction of object using two points.

      • generateString

        public abstract String generateString()
        Generates string representation of object for storing in vector graphics file.
        Returns:
        string representation of geometric object.

      • fromString

        public static GeometricObject fromString(String string)
        Factory method creates new GeometricObject from its string representation. String representation is usually obtained as a single line in vector graphics file and consists of keyword specifying type of geometric object and list of integer parameters.
        Parameters:
        string - string representation of new GeometricObject.
        Returns:
        new GeometricObject as specified by its string representation.

      • getBoundingBox

        public abstract Rectangle getBoundingBox()
        Returns bounding box, i.e. the smallest rectangle containing given geometric object.
        Returns:
        bounding box for the geometric object.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
